attributes.action: Not undetake cuts both in budget and manpower to the armed forces including the TA whilst they are undertaking operations and to ensure that any reviews are taken in light of current operations and that the armed forces advice is requested and taken.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
The Prime Minister believes that properly funding and equipping the armed forces is a very high priority, and that the frontline will have everything it needs for the mission in Afghanistan to succeed.

The Prime Minister, together with the Defence Secretary, the Chief of General Staff and the Chancellor, have been considering proposed savings in the TA budget. 

However, they have concluded that an additional £20m would be found from the Treasury Reserve to ensure all normal training for TA members could continue as before.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
